author: sandygao
msg: 1. Provide canonical representations of Schema datatypes;
2. Provide more accurate equality checking for union types.

author: neilg
msg: fix broken pack-tools target.  Most of the LICENSE files, and the new xjavac task, were formerly omitted.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: neilg
msg: fixing bug 14455.  Since it is not possible to read a byte stream twice, we used to fail when we tried doing so.

author: sandygao
msg: Now we can process the Schema for Schemas
without reporting any errors. Inserted special logic to permit the presence
of the built-in Schema datatypes in this particular schema.
